sentences: At the time, they all lived in Troy, New York, and the "Troy-Core" moniker was embraced.
In 2012, O'Brien decided to leave the band to focus more on his family.
In late 2017, Sean Green had a mutual departure from the band.

In 2018, Brick By Brick signed with Upstate Records, and entered the studio to record their sixth studio record, Hive Mentality, which would include a revamp of the song "In The Ruins", again featuring Vincent Bennett of The Acacia Strain.
James Muller – drums (2012–present)Former membersRich Roberts – vocals (2004–2005, 2006–2014)
